meanings.definition: A type of sugar compound found in plants.
meanings.sent1: Some plants store energy in the form of arabinosides.
meanings.sent2: Arabinosides are important for the growth of certain plant species.
meanings.sent3: The arabinosides in the plant seemed to be having a party, dancing around in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The arabinosides in the plant were like tiny sweet treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the flowers were fueled by the magical power of arabinosides.

meanings.definition: Compounds derived from arabinose, commonly used in pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the potential benefits of arabinosides in medicine.
meanings.sent2: Arabinosides play a crucial role in the development of certain drugs.
meanings.sent3: The arabinosides in the lab were behaving like little superheroes, fighting off illnesses.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, arabinosides are the unsung heroes that save lives.
